Literature.Title: The peculiar N- and (-termini of trichogin GA IV are needed for membrane interaction and human cell death induction at doses lacking antibiotic activity.
Literature.Author: Tavano R, Malachin G, De Zotti M, Peggion C, Biondi B, Forrnaggio F, Papini E

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=8 µM,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=16 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6±2.8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=6±2.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=32±0µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(EC50=11µM),Human epidermoid carcinoma A431(EC50=12.5µM),Human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60(EC50=14µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(EC50=17.5µM)
